Crossbow.Name: Hunter's Mark
Crossbow.Effect: Whenever the player targets a foe with a Crossbow attack, the target gains one Mark after the attack resolves. When attacking a target with a Mark, the user's attack gains +5% damage per Mark (this does not stack for multitarget moves). Crossbow moves are only affected by Marks applied by the user.

Crossbow.Name: Arrow Flurry
Crossbow.Effect: If the original target has a Mark, this move gains Splash 1. If the target has 2+ Marks, this move instead gains Splash 2.

Crossbow.Name: Arrow Net
Crossbow.Effect: If the target has a Mark, they are inflicted with Slow/1. If the target has 2+ Marks, the user may inflict the target with 6 Cripple/1 instead.

Crossbow.Name: Shadow Quiver
Crossbow.Effect: The user's next Crossbow attack becomes magical and ignores all obstructions in its path (including Air tiles and Personal Bubble).

Crossbow.Name: Scoping Shot
Crossbow.Effect: For one round, all attacks on the target gain +1 ACC for every mark the target has.

Crossbow.Name: Quick Scope
Crossbow.Effect: Regardless of hit or miss, the user's next Crossbow Standard/Full this turn does not give the target a Mark from Hunter's Mark. This attack is immune to outside factors to damage. Do not add ATK/MAG.

Crossbow.Name: Explosive Shot
Crossbow.Effect: The target gains a "bomb". The user may choose to detonate this bomb as a trigger action on their turn, dealing 1d8+2X damage to all foes within Burst 2 of the target, where X is the amount of Marks the target has. The bomb automatically detonates when the user or target dies, or after two rounds.

Crossbow.Name: Tornado Bolt
Crossbow.Effect: This move has Push X, where X is the amount of Marks the target has. If the target is unable to be pushed the full distance, the target gains another Mark.

Crossbow.Name: Pierce
Crossbow.Effect: If a target has 1+ Marks, this move ignores evasions. If a target has 2+ marks, this move also ignores negative accuracy modifiers.

Crossbow.Name: Serrated Arrows
Crossbow.Effect: This move inflicts 5 Bleed/X, where X is the amount of Marks the target has.

Crossbow.Name: Ballista
Crossbow.Effect: This may only be used on a target with 2+ Marks. The X in this attack is the amount of Marks the target has.

Longbow.Name: Skill Shot
Longbow.Effect: This move can be used regardless of the user’s statuses (except stun) or foes’ move effects, and it cannot be prevented from doing damage.

Longbow.Name: Chase Arrow
Longbow.Effect: This attack is immune to outside damage factors.

Longbow.Name: Rupture
Longbow.Effect: This attack ignores evasions and accuracy modifiers. If the target has a buff to evasions or the user has a debuff to accuracy, this inflicts 5 Bleed/1 on the target.

Longbow.Name: Long Shot
Longbow.Effect: This attack cannot have its range reduced. If the target has targeted the user from outside Range 6 at some point, and this is the first time the user has used this move on the target, this attack inflicts Seal/1.

Longbow.Name: Bow Slam
Longbow.Effect: Targets are pushed in the direction of the cone. For one round, the user is immune to being moved by other players and immune to damage from effects dependent on Push/Pull.

Longbow.Name: Turtle Shot
Longbow.Effect:
If the target has fulfilled both the below conditions during the last two rounds, this attack gains +3 dice:
 - Not targeted another player with a non-global attack
 - Not taken more than 20 damage from a single source.
 This move cannot be used during the first two rounds of the game.

Longbow.Name: Tranquil Technique
Longbow.Effect: The user's next attack on a foe cannot have its damage reduced.

Longbow.Name: Squall Volley
Longbow.Effect: If the user is debuffed from effects originating from foes, this attack ignores those debuffs that the user has and hits thrice instead.

Longbow.Name: Arrow Rain
Longbow.Effect: Foes hit are inflicted with any status effects the user has. The user may choose to target an empty space instead of a player for -3 accuracy on this attack.

Longbow.Name: Shatter Shot
Longbow.Effect: This attack's initial damage roll only considers the base roll, ATK bonus and positive damage/dice bonuses. After applying other factors, invert the resultant damage loss.

Shortbow.Name: Hawkeye
Shortbow.Effect: Up to twice per turn, the user may choose to sacrifice 5 damage for +2 accuracy and +2 crit range this turn. This debuff is unremovable.

Shortbow.Name: Blitz
Shortbow.Effect: For each successful hit, the user gains +2 damage on their next attack.

Shortbow.Name: Windmill
Shortbow.Effect: The user gains +X accuracy and critical range on this attack, where X = The amount of foes being targeted - 1.

Shortbow.Name: Venom Shot
Shortbow.Effect: This attacks inflicts X Poison/1 on the target, where X is 2* accuracy bonus the user has. (If the user has no accuracy bonus, do not inflict Poison.)

Shortbow.Name: Homing Shot
Shortbow.Effect: This move automatically hits the target. (This move still rolls accuracy)

Shortbow.Name: Salvo
Shortbow.Effect: When using a multihit attack, the user may choose different targets for each individual hit. When targeting different foes, instead of adding ATK/MAG only to the first hit, add the user's ATK/MAG and +/- damage effects divided by the amount of unique targets to the damage dealt to each foe.

Shortbow.Name: Dampening Shot
Shortbow.Effect: If this move deals less than 30 damage, inflict Seal/1 on the target.

Shortbow.Name: Hook Shot
Shortbow.Effect: The user may choose between pulling the target towards the user or pulling the user toward the target. This move can be used as a non-damaging standard on any non-player obstruction to pull the user to the target. If the user's accuracy is raised by at least two this turn, this move is immune to negative outside factors to damage.

Shortbow.Name: Trick Arrow
Shortbow.Effect: If the user's accuracy is raised by at least three this turn, this move gains Splash 1.

Shortbow.Name: Sagittarian Pride
Shortbow.Effect: For each successful hit of this attack, subsequent hits gain +1 accuracy and +1 crit range.

Shortbow.Name: Arrow Storm
Shortbow.Effect: This attack critical hits on 18+ and is immune to positive outside factors to damage. Critical hits on this move have triple instead of double base dice.
